description: Learn more about Video Gallery at hartfordhospital.org
cleaned_text: Medical Rounds: Fall Prevention Month Medical Rounds, Fall Prevention Month, Steven Davis, MD, orthopedic surgeon, Bone & Joint Institute, Hartford Hospital, in older adults see serious injuries with falls, broken bones, hip fractures, try to prevent falls initially, reduce tripping hazards, be aware of weather and wear the right footwear.
